articles.description: Reaction to the EFL Cup action after Chelsea, Manchester City, Aston Villa and Leicester all reach the fourth round, plus latest football news.
articles.title: EFL Cup reaction: Chelsea. Manchester City and Aston Villa go through

articles.description: Manchester City confirm Spain midfielder Rodri suffered a knee ligament injury against Arsenal on Sunday.
articles.title: Rodri injury: Manchester City confirm midfielder suffered knee ligament injury against Arsenal

articles.description: Former Manchester United, Real Madrid and France defender Raphael Varane retires from football at the age of 31.
articles.title: Raphael Varane: Former Manchester United, Real Madrid and France defender retires aged 31

articles.description: The Manchester United manager faces a club close to his heart on Wednesday, but also one where tragedies defined his fledgling career.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: How Manchester United boss was shaped by plane crash, fireworks disaster & car tragedy at FC Twente

articles.description: England's stand-in captain Harry Brook responds to his critics with the bat and with his words with a breakout one-day international century.
articles.title: England vs Australia: Harry Brook responds to his critics with century in Chester-le-Street

articles.description: Matheus Nunes scores his first Manchester City goal and 16-year-old Kaden Braithwaite becomes the third-youngest player to start for the Blues in their 2-0 EFL Cup win against Watford
articles.title: Manchester City 2-1 Watford: Jeremy Doku and Matheus Nunes on target in EFL Cup tie

articles.description: Brett Favre, one of the NFL's greatest quarterbacks, reveals he has Parkinson's disease.
articles.title: Brett Favre Parkinson's diagnosis: Three-time NFL MVP reveals he has disease

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe scores in his fifth consecutive match to continue his brilliant start to life in a Real Madrid shirt.
articles.title: Real Madrid 3-2 Deportivo Alavés: Kylian Mbappe scores again

articles.description: Uefa have re-opened the bidding for stadiums to host the 2027 Champions League final after the match was stripped from AC Milan.
articles.title: Champions League: Uefa re-open bidding for stadiums for 2027 final

articles.description: Red Bull head of race strategy Will Courtenay will leave the team after 14 years in the role to join McLaren as sporting director.
articles.title: Red Bull head of race strategy Will Courtenay to leave team for McLaren
